verses.verse: It happened the same year, <WH8141> in the beginning <WH7225> of the reign <WH4467> of Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> in the fourth <WH7243> year, <WH8141> in the fifth <WH2549> month, <WH2320> that Hananiah <WH2608> the son <WH1121> of Azzur, <WH5809> the prophet, <WH5030> who was of Gibeon, <WH1391> spoke <WH559> to me in the house <WH1004> of Yahweh, <WH3068> in the presence <WH5869> of the priests <WH3548> and of all the people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559>
